bibl.title: The Ostraca of Victor the Priest Found in the Hermitage MMA 1152.
Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013.

bibl.note: Edition of 8 letters dating from the first half of the 7th century sent by Victor the priest, who was head of the monastery of saint Phoibammon. - 1. O. TT 1152 Inv. C.O. 79. Letter to Azarias about a camel. - 2. Inv. 155. Letter to Iezekhiêl and (?) Djôr. - 3. Inv. 170. Letter to Djôr and Iezekhiêl about a book of Shenoute and a night of vigil. - 4. Inv. 174. Letter to Iezekhiêl and Djôr about a book of Shenoute and a corpse. - 5. Inv. 180. Letter to Djôr about a book. - 6. Inv. 90. Letter to Iezekhiêl and Djôr. - 7. Inv. 136. Letter to Iezekhiêl and Djôr. - 8. Inv. 171. Letter to Iezekhiêl and Djôr.
bibl.seg: Esther Garel, The Ostraca of Victor the Priest Found in the Hermitage MMA 1152.

Tomasz Derda, Adam Łajtar & Jakub Urbanik (edd.), in cooperation with Andrzej Mirończuk & Tomasz Ochała, Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology, Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013. Volume II. Subliterary Papyri, Documentary Papyri, Scribal Practices, Linguistic Matters = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XXVIII (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 1041-1054, 15 figg.

Edition of 8 letters dating from the first half of the 7th century sent by Victor the priest, who was head of the monastery of saint Phoibammon. - 1. O. TT 1152 Inv. C.O. 79. Letter to Iezekhiêl and Djôr about a book of Shenoute and a corpse. - 5. Inv. 180. Letter to Djôr about a book. - 6. Inv. 90. Letter to Iezekhiêl and Djôr. - 7. Inv. 136. Letter to Iezekhiêl and Djôr. - 8. Inv. 171. Letter to Iezekhiêl and Djôr.
